abstract.p: List of government closings for Columbus Day; Yom Kippur holy day also noted

block.p: Columbus Day, actually Oct. 12, will be legally observed. Yom Kippur is also observed tomorrow.
NEW YORK
Columbus Day, actually Oct. 12, will be legally observed. Yom Kippur is also observed tomorrow.
NEW YORK
GOVERNMENT OFFICES -- Federal, state and municipal offices closed.
POST OFFICES -- Express Mail only; main post office on Eighth Avenue at 32nd Street is open.
BANKS -- Option to close.
PARKING -- Alternate-side regulations will be suspended. Meters still in effect unless otherwise denoted.
SANITATION -- No pickups and no street cleaning.
SCHOOLS
Closed in New York City; option to close elsewhere.
FINANCIAL MARKETS -- Stock markets are open, bond markets are closed.
TRANSPORTATION -- New York City subways and buses will operate on a weekday schedule. The Long Island Rail Road and Metro-North will operate on a weekday schedule.
NEW JERSEY
GOVERNMENT OFFICES -- Federal and state offices closed.
POST OFFICES -- Express Mail only.
BANKS -- Option to close.
SCHOOLS -- Option to close.
TRANSPORTATION -- New Jersey Transit rail service will operate on a weekday schedule. PATH trains will operate on a modified weekday schedule.
CONNECTICUT
GOVERNMENT OFFICES -- Federal and state offices closed.
POST OFFICES -- Express Mail only.
BANKS -- Option to close.
SCHOOLS -- Closed.
TRANSPORTATION -- Metro-North trains will operate on a weekday schedule.
